history.proof: intros x u. unfold opp. unfold scal. qauto depth: 4 l: on use: scal_zero_r, @plus_reg_r, scal_distr_l, @plus_opp_l unfold: scal, opp, AbelianGroup.sort, ModuleSpace.AbelianGroup, ModuleSpace.sort.

original: intros x u. unfold opp. unfold scal. rewrite scal_distr_l. rewrite <- scal_assoc. rewrite opp_mult_m1. rewrite scal_assoc. rewrite scal_opp_l. reflexivity.
